page.title: 03WORCESTERSHIRE GARDENS
page.content:
Gardening as a hobby is flourishing, particularly the cultivation of lawns and flower borders as an open-air extension to the home.
Because the time most couples can spend on gardening is restricted, they aim for an easy-care garden. To meet this need, lawns are mown by mechanical mowers and borders have largely ground cover plants which smother weeds, and bulbs which, once planted, bloom annually.
There are two nurseries: one producing heathers, for ground cover; the other nerines, an autumn flowering bulb.
Close by there is another business making and selling timber garden furniture such as summer houses, tables and chairs.
